__e: Are you happy that you've gotten what you want?
Yes. Teacher Kang! That we're having our class here makes me really, really, really very happy!
Mr. Gang, this is your first time teaching in such a school, right?
You mean, Kang Chi was trapped and captured?
Oh, no, your father died protecting Choe Kangchi.
My tech may not be as advanced as yours, Kang, but I'm a quick study.
The one in the picture was Kang Ma Roo.
Even though Kang Ma Ru will also be attending, I will stop it first.
Do you know what Kang Ha is up to now?
And if Kang has made up his mind, there's nothing I can do.
Chief kang'll get the message, don't you think?
He's making this up so Kang doesn't hurt his family.
Kang would not go out like that, sir. That's not who he is.
The fact that Director Kang's brother is in the same nursing home... - Why didn't he tell me?
Kang Se Ri, there's nothing I can do for you.
Well, Kang's gone who knows where, or when
Are things progressing well between you and your girlfriend Kang Se Ri?
